short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights code blocks in Substack. It also copies code in one click and changes the font size. Supports 20+ programming languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it very convenient for users to read and use code blocks found on Substack.
